subject: Trading Cards
Baseball
Families and Family Life
Basketball
Football
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When my mother arrived last summer with 5,000 of my old sports cards packed into Mother Goose shoeboxes, my sons opened each flimsy container as if it were the Ark of the Covenant.
snippet: When my mother arrived last summer with 5,000 of my old sports cards packed into Mother Goose shoeboxes, my sons opened each flimsy container as if it were the Ark of the Covenant.
